EXAMPLE THM
HYPOTHESES: 
POINT A B C D E F G
R_TRIANGLE C A B
ANGLE_BISECTOR D C A B
ON_LINE D B C
ON_LINE E B C
FOOT F E A B
ANGLE_BISECTOR G C E F
ON_LINE G A C
SHOW: PARALLEL G E A D
